comments.creator: tlindemu@adobe.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

Problem:
There is a screen update performance issue when using Firefox 5 when compared to Safari on Mac.  I believe this is because of some performance issue with using NPAPI.  This affects both StageVideo and MoleHill, but only on specific cards it seems

Method:
1) Goto http://infiniteturtles.co.uk/projects/away3d/broomstick/ShallowWaterDemo.html
2) Mouseclick and drag over the purple plan, notice that the points update slowly and the framerate is poor
3) Run the same test in Safari, note framerate is good




Actual results:

Result:
Poor performance in FF compared to Safari





Expected results:

Expected:
Screen update and percieved framerate should be the same
